title: MAG 155 - Cost of Living Transcript
text:
rough books it can punch through, uh… Well it - it 
should do the trick. No reason to try and make it too complicated. 
ARCHIVIST 
I - I suppose not. 
MELANIE 
I’ve left a proper resignation letter on Lukas’s desk. It was quite satisfying to 
write, actually. Almost made me wish it was Elias. He would have hated me not 
serving out my two weeks notice, heh. Not sure Lukas even knows who I am… 
probably for the best. 
ARCHIVIST 
We’ll miss you. 
MELANIE 
(Wryly) Wish I could say the same. 
ARCHIVIST 
(Quietly) Yeah. Do you need any, uh... help? 
MELANIE 
(Deep breath) No. I’ve got this. But if you, um... If you could… In five minutes, I 
would appreciate it if you could call me an ambulance. 

The Magnus Archives – 155 – Cost of Living 
17 
 
ARCHIVIST 
Right. 
[Tape clicks off.] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme – Outro]

Today’s episode was written by Jonathan Sims and directed by Alexander J 
Newall. 
It featured: Jonathan Sims as The Archivist, Frank Voss as Basira Hussein and Lydia 
Nicholas as Melanie Barker.
